scripts.bootstrap: npm run install-deps && npm run start-prod
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm run build && npm run copy-types-for-client && cd ../
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.install-client: cd client && npm install && cd ../ && npm run copy-types-from-server
scripts.install-deps: npm install && npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd client && npm run watch-css" "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run build && npm run start-dev"
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build-client && npm run start-server-prod
scripts.start-server-prod: cd server && npm run build && npm run start-prod
scripts.prod-build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.copy-types-from-server: cd server && npm run copy-types-for-client && cd ../
